item.title: UnitedHealth is dropping a million seniors from Medicare Advantage as it aims to restore its ‘swagger’
item.description: America’s largest insurer is making sweeping changes to its Medicare Advantage plans to improve profit margins.

item.title: ‘He lived alone in Section 8 housing’: My late uncle’s landlord disposed of his art collection. What can we do?
item.description: “The management company said they would store his belongings.”

item.title: ‘He’s executor of his dad’s estate’: Should my son use his late father’s bank account to pay for funeral expenses?
item.description: “There’s no trust in place, but there is a will.”

item.title: Here’s why Nexstar’s CEO thinks the FCC should change the rules to allow a merger with Tegna

item.title: This is why Trump & Co. keep talking about phantom $2,000 checks
